title: Ashton Kutcher pushes his children in shopping cart at craft store
text:
He's a devoted father of two.

And Ashton Kutcher was every inch the family man while enjoying some quality time with his children earlier this week.

The actor, 41, was spotted pushing his youngsters, Wyatt, five, and Dimitri, two, in a shopping cart during a trip to Michael's Arts & Crafts in Studio City on Monday.

Family fun! Ashton Kutcher was every inch the family man while enjoying some quality time with his children earlier this week

The children must have been delighted to enjoy a little ride back to their car as their father carefully navigated his way through the parking lot.

Dimitri stood inside the center of the cart as his sister stood alongside the front, chatting away with her brother.

Ashton stayed focused on both his children and the path ahead, no doubt keeping an eye open for any potential roadblocks.

The former That 70's Show actor wore a black sweatshirt, slacks, trainers, and cap for the laid-back family outing.

Oh brother! Wyatt appeared to be chatting with her younger brother as he stood in the center of the cart

Doting dad: Kutcher supervised as his children scampered about the cart

His wife Mila Kunis did not appear to have joined the family for the outing.

Ashton and Mila married in 2015, years after first meeting as co-stars on the set of That 70's Show.

The couple tied the knot just a few years after Ashton ended his first marriage to Demi Moore.

The actor's relationship with Demi has been back in the public eye after the actress released her memoir, Inside Out.

In the book, Demi accused Ashton of cheating on her twice, and revealed they had threesomes.

Throwback: Kutcher with his then-wife Demi Moore in 2011, just a few years before their divorce
description: The actor, 41, was spotted pushing his youngsters, Wyatt and Dimitri, in a shopping cart during a trip to Michael's Arts & Crafts in Studio City on Monday. Not pictured was Ashton's wife Demi Moore.
